certification_process.title: Application Submission
certification_process.description: Submit application with farm details and current practices

certification_process.title: Conversion Period
certification_process.description: 3-year transition period for soil and crops

certification_process.title: Certification
certification_process.description: Final certification and organic label approval

practices.name: Composting
practices.description: Prepare organic compost from farm waste and cow dung
practices.implementation: Mix farm waste with cow dung in 3:1 ratio, turn weekly for 3 months

practices.name: Green Manuring
practices.description: Grow nitrogen-fixing crops and incorporate into soil
practices.implementation: Grow dhaincha or sunhemp for 45-60 days, then incorporate

practices.name: Neem-based Sprays
practices.description: Use neem oil and neem cake for pest control
practices.implementation: Mix 2ml neem oil per liter water, spray in evening hours

practices.name: Companion Planting
practices.description: Plant pest-repelling crops alongside main crops
practices.implementation: Plant marigold with tomatoes, basil with peppers
